description: McKay-Thompson series of class 49a for Monster.
links: D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; A1 = QP[q]; A2 = QP[q^7]; A3 = QP[q^49]; s = -3 q + (A2^4 + 7*q^3*A1^2*A3^2)/(A1*A3)/(A1^2 + 7*q^2*A1*A3 + 7*q^4*A3^2) + O[q]^30; CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 16 2015, adapted from A136560 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2000
